name: Rolling Snake.io
description:
This is an alternative client for #1 Snake Game.

- Eat little dots to grow up
- Avoid bigger snakes
- Try to around enemies and become the biggest snake possible

Play against other people online! Can you become the biggest snake ^^
Watch out - if your head touches another snake, you will be explode and then it's game over. But if you get other snakes to run into you, then they will explode and you can eat their remains :)
